channel.title: Comments on: The Collidoscope Manifesto
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Integration in Berlin: Research for a Desolate Landscape | Migration Systems
item.dc:creator: Integration in Berlin: Research for a Desolate Landscape | Migration Systems
item.description: […] About the author: One year ago Kelly Miller and Sophia Burton launched the project Collidoscope Berlin. Their goal is “to do something different related to the topic of difference [...] and do this through the lens of one city that, although formed by a unique historical and political context, could perhaps provide lessons for others”. See also: The Collidoscope Manifesto […]
item.content:encoded: […] About the author: One year ago Kelly Miller and Sophia Burton launched the project Collidoscope Berlin. Their goal is “to do something different related to the topic of difference […] and do this through the lens of one city that, although formed by a unique historical and political context, could perhaps provide lessons for others”. See also: The Collidoscope Manifesto […]
